entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is trying to approach and touch the potion. He is smiling faintly and has a wand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is trying to touch the potion with his hand. He is staring at the potion and attempting to push through an invisible barrier.

relationships.description: Dumbledore tries to approach Harry, who is trying to touch the potion.
Dumbledore raises his wand and makes complicated movements over the surface of the potion.
